originalText.text: When I moved to a new neighborhood I took my time to search for a great school for my 6 years old daughter. During my search I found about Kipp Star Harlem it was 30 minutes driving from where I live but I was so impressed by their excellent score that I took the chance. Luckily my daughter was accepted right away. She had the best kindergarten teacher in her last charter school. At the graduation day she asked me which new school my daughter would be attending  She was so happy when she knew it was Kipp Star. Surprisingly she was a teacher on Kipp Star and she told me everything she knows she learned from that school. She also said  that the school is very fun and academically exceptional. I couldn‚Äôt be more happier. My husband, my parents, my daughter and I went to the preview family meeting where we could meet the teachers staff and see the classrooms. We were so impressed by how the school organized the classrooms. Everything was connected for the kids learning in a fun way. Almost 2 months later I still impressed and very happy about my daughter being a Kipp Star student. My daughter loveee it. She cried when she had early dismissal day. She didn‚Äôt want to leave. I was so scared since she loved her last school but now I am so release. Also I want to add that The principal and staff have coffee and talk meetings with all parents to keep updated about everything relate to the school.

originalText.text: My son has been with kipp star harlem since they opened in 2014. I love the structure with in the school and how family orientated all the staff are. The teachers are always involved in the childrens growth. The communication between the parents and faculty is awesome. I would recommend this school to all my family and friends.

text.text: My son has been with kipp star harlem since they opened in 2014. I love the structure with in the school and how family orientated all the staff are. The teachers are always involved in the childrens growth. The communication between the parents and faculty is awesome. I would recommend this school to all my family and friends.

originalText.text: 2016-2017 was my daughter first year attending kipp star for kindergarten .this school is great and very attentive to the children . my daughter was reading and spelling full words by the 2nd week of school . i like that they teach children to have discipline ,respect for their peers and teachers .The teachers make sure to say hello to all children by name on a  daily basis which i find the most impressing .This school is one of the best i have been to .

originalText.text: This school is an awesome school. The teaching skills, discipline skills, and the motivation skills are excellent. I recommend this school to all kids. If you want a great education for your child look into kipp....

originalText.text: My son started kindergarten today 8/21/17 I love the way all the teacher/Staff was outside waiting to meet and greet me and my child although they say the parents couldn't enter the building for the first 2 weeks because they don't want the children to start crying which is quite understanderable ... and the early dismissal it's seem  quite oküçéüçéüçéüçé
